text: To move use WASD, Arrows or the left Joystick
Press Space or A to jump
To re-read signs approach a sign and press X or to remind yourself of the previous sign press Y at any point.
To go back down stairs press down
To cross this path use the moving platform
I should be able to climb those vines just like stairs
Collecting Gems add points to the score
You will face enemies on your adventure, so watch out
I can attack it by pressing x
To complete the level approach the floating cube
